org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.io.input.event

Interface EventInput<T extends Event>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Input, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChatInput<T,S>, DiscordChatInput, MockUpChatInput, PrivateChatInput<T,S>, SerialInput, TipeeestreamEventInput, TwitchChatInput

    public interface EventInput<T extends Event>
extends Input
    An input that allows listening for events from the connected service

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • registerEventHandler

        <S extends T> void registerEventHandler(java.util.function.Consumer<S> eventHandler,
                                        java.lang.Class<S> eventClass)
        Register a new event handler that listens for a specific event

        The eventClass can be get by using Event.class (in java) or classOf[Event] (in scala)

        There are more specific methods for each Event that don't require you to provide the eventCLass!

        Parameters:
        eventHandler - consumer for which `accept()` is called if the event is fired
        eventClass - class of the events for which this listener should listen
